amendment.description: To require certain dietary supplement manufacturers to report certain serious adverse events.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3463 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 3463 proposed by Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 3225. (consideration: CR S7083-7086; text: CR S7083) To require certain dietary supplement manufacturers to report certain serious adverse events.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3463 proposed by Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 3225.
